snippet.title: Blame Him - 4K  Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Out June 2nd, 2019.

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/950400/Blame_Him

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/chillasart

Blame Him is a true first-person survival horror game with stealth and intuitive puzzle elements made by 2 people from Japan. Loved by and scared many YouTubers and Streamers.

Key Features:
• True survival horror - Gameplay centered experiences that are true to the survival horror genre.
• Atmospheric Environment - Eerie atmosphere and realistic environments.
• Challenges - Enemies, focused on stealth and intuitive puzzles.
• Little to no hand holding.
